examples: Completed client onboarding forms, tax registration forms.

examples: Letters from the Finanzamt, power of attorney, tax assessment notices.

description: Private expenses that are tax-deductible by law.
examples: Church tax, donation receipts, initial vocational training costs.

description: Unavoidable, high private expenses compared to the average person.
examples: Medical bills, dental costs, funeral expenses, disability-related costs.

description: Contributions toward future security and insurance.
examples: Health, long-term care, and unemployment insurance certificates.

description: Specifically for certified private pension plans.
examples: Riester or Rürup pension contribution statements.

description: Expenses and data related to children.
examples: School fee receipts, childcare invoices (Kita), child benefit info.

description: Income from a registered commercial business.
examples: Profit/loss statements for a shop, trade tax documents.

description: Income from professional 'liberal' services (doctors, lawyers, etc.).
examples: Invoices and expense logs for freelancers or consultants.

description: Wages from domestic/foreign employment or residency status.
examples: Annual salary statements (Lohnsteuerbescheinigung), foreign paystubs.

description: Costs incurred to earn income (strictly work-related).
examples: Commuting logs, work equipment (laptop), home office bills.

description: Income from investments, interest, or dividends.
examples: Annual tax certificates from banks, dividend statements.

description: Income/expenses from renting out property.
examples: Rental contracts, property repair bills, property management fees.

description: General category for income earned outside Germany.
examples: Proof of foreign taxes paid, foreign income statements.

description: Information regarding international tax treaties or status.
examples: Double taxation treaty documents, certificates of residence.

description: Chronological logs or time-based documentation.
examples: Driver's logbooks (Fahrtenbuch), appointment diaries.

description: Documents belonging to the prior tax period.
examples: The final tax assessment (Steuerbescheid) from the last year.

description: Documents for the upcoming tax period.
examples: Pre-payment notices for the next year, future contracts.

description: Documents that are irrelevant to the tax return.
examples: Private grocery receipts, internal drafts, duplicates.
